text: ivarkalukku nilaiyana corkkankal untu. Avarril niraruvikal totarntu otik konteyirukkum. Avarkalukkup (paricakap) porkatakam anivikkappatum. Melliyatakavo aluttamanatakavo (avarkal virumpiya) pacumaiyana pattataikalai anivarkal. Irukkaikalilulla talaiyanaikal mitu cayntu (mikka ullacamaka) irupparkal. Ivarkalutaiya kuli mikka nanre! Ivarkal inpam anupavikkinra itamum mikka alakanatu
